mapper.select: select idx,writer,memo,to_char(post_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') post_date from memo where writer like '%'|| #{search} || '%' or memo like '%'|| #{search} || '%' order by idx asc
select idx,writer,memo,to_char(post_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') post_date from memo where ${searchkey} like '%'|| #{search} || '%' order by idx asc
mapper.insert: insert into memo ( idx, writer, memo ) values ( (select nvl( max(idx)+1, 1) from memo), #{writer}, #{memo})
